data.name: 詛咒铠甲
data.detailed_description:
💟Add in WishList!!💟


关于游戏

Game Content:
1500 years after the Demon King's seal
An innocent girl, Lilina, who dreams to be the best adventurer in the world, starts her journey.
Unfortunately, because of her bloodline, she has been chosen by a demon. She is forced to wear a set of cursed armor, and goes on an adventure of finding six divine artifacts to remove the curse...

Key Points:
1、All costumes effect charactor's avatar and pixel animations, with the Beauty Salon's cosplay system, you can customize the heroine your own style.
2、All kinds of sexual events have been planted into multiple side-quests, we have over 200 events and 1134 CG variations in the game!
3、Scenarios matter! We take full use of the combinations of pixel animations and CGs to create perfect RPG game experiences.
4、Various paths, endings and game rounds interact with each other, you will have at least 20+ hours of the enjoyment of the game!

Cards: According to the latest policies of Steam, cards will drop only when the game reaches to a certain level after its release.




Join the Discord server of Cursed Armor to discuss with other players about the game and get help & patches from the development group directly
：
data.about_the_game:
Game Content:
1500 years after the Demon King's seal
An innocent girl, Lilina, who dreams to be the best adventurer in the world, starts her journey.
Unfortunately, because of her bloodline, she has been chosen by a demon. She is forced to wear a set of cursed armor, and goes on an adventure of finding six divine artifacts to remove the curse...

Key Points:
1、All costumes effect charactor's avatar and pixel animations, with the Beauty Salon's cosplay system, you can customize the heroine your own style.
2、All kinds of sexual events have been planted into multiple side-quests, we have over 200 events and 1134 CG variations in the game!
3、Scenarios matter! We take full use of the combinations of pixel animations and CGs to create perfect RPG game experiences.
4、Various paths, endings and game rounds interact with each other, you will have at least 20+ hours of the enjoyment of the game!

Cards: According to the latest policies of Steam, cards will drop only when the game reaches to a certain level after its release.

data.short_description: The widely acclaimed series Cursed Armor has first time joined in Steam! An innocent girl, Lilina .She is forced to wear a set of cursed armor, and goes on an adventure of finding six divine artifacts to remove the curse...
data.supported_languages: 英语, 繁体中文, 简体中文

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: windows7
  • 处理器: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent AMD
  • 内存: 512 MB RAM
  • 显卡: nVidia GeForce GTX 280 series or higher
  • 存储空间: 需要 512 MB 可用空间
pc_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 操作系统: windows7
  • 处理器: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent AMD
  • 内存: 512 MB RAM
  • 显卡: nVidia GeForce GTX 280 series or higher
  • 存储空间: 需要 1024 MB 可用空间

content_descriptors.notes: The content contained in this game may not be suitable for all ages, or should not be accessed at work: naked or pornographic content, common adult content .
